Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tosca Testsuite is a widely used test automation and test management suite. It has a proven track record of successful testing projects through its risk optimization and model based testing approaches and has been recognized by market analysts as a “market leading test automation and test case design suite”. With the growing need for the adoption of ‘cloud computing’, our new Cloud-Based Test management Suite, Tosca-as-a-Service (TaaS), is currently available to offer Tosca Testsuite on demand and fully browser-accessible.
This webinar will guide you through:
- A discussion of the challenges we found with on-premise installations - An introduction of Tosca as a Service, the fully cloud-enabled version of Tosca Testsuite - Several options we made available to customers in this first version - and its benefits - A comprehensive live demo
Following the webinar, a Q&A period will be available for any questions you may have. Check out our solutions page <http://www.tricentis.com/solutions/TaaS> and video <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new>, for more information on TaaS.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
